text:
Saluran sokongan X kami kini fokus pada kemas kini mengenai perkhidmatan dan pengumuman.

Hubungi kami melalui saluran lain untuk bantuan! 
______

Our X support channel is now focused on service updates and announcements.

Reach us through other channels for support!
#RapidKL

Waktu operasi Stesen Bukit Jalil dilanjutkan sehingga jam 12.30 tengah malam pada 14 Februari 2026. 

Rujuk poster untuk info lanjut.

#RapidKL

Kemas Kini Laluan LRT Ampang/Sri Petaling: Kerja-kerja baik pulih gangguan sistem teknikal telah selesai dijalankan, dan perkhidmatan tren beroperasi seperti biasa. 

Kami memohon maaf atas sebarang kesulitan yang dialami dan menghargai kesabaran anda.

Ampang/Sri Petaling LRT Line Update: Repair works to the technical system disruption have been completed, and train services are operating as normal.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your patience.
Kemas Kini Laluan LRT Ampang/Sri Petaling: Perkhidmatan tren alternatif telah diaktifkan berikutan gangguan sistem teknikal dan akan berterusan sehingga tamat waktu operasi hari ini.
LRT Ampang/Sri Petaling Line Update: Alternative train services have been activated due to a technical system failure and will continue until the end of operating hours today.

1. Trains from Putra Heights will turn back at Kinrara.
2. Trains from Sentul Timur will turn back at Awan Besar Platform1.
3. Shuttle trains from Kinrara Platform 1 to Awan Besar Platform 1.

We apologize for the inconvenience.
Kemas Kini Laluan LRT Ampang/Sri Petaling: Perkhidmatan tren alternatif telah diaktifkan berikutan daripada gangguan sistem teknikal, sementara kerja-kerja baik pulih sedang dijalankan.
LRT Ampang/Sri Petaling Line Update: Alternative train services have been activated due to a technical system failure, while repair work is underway.

1. Trains from Putra Heights will turn back at Kinrara.
2. Trains from Sentul Timur will turn back at Awan Besar Platform1.
3. Shuttkle trains from Kinrara Platform 1 to Awan Besar Platform 1.

Follow us for further updates.

We apologize for any inconvenience.
